import React from 'react'; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; import { postPokemon, getTipos } from '../actions/index.js'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; export default function PokemonCreate(){ const dispatch = useDispatch(); let estadoTipos = useSelector((state) => state.arrayTipos) /*VERIFICAR SI ES tipo, tipos o estadoTipos*/ const [input, setInput] = useState({ name: '', hp: '', attack: '', defense: '', speed: '', height: '', weight: '', image: '', tipo: [] }) useEffect(() => { dispatch(getTipos()); }, []) return (

Crea tu Pokemon!

) }
